snippet: Works for voice and electronics by the Finnish composer Kaija Saariaho created an otherworldly atmosphere on Monday evening at Zankel Hall.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews program Voix, Espace, a multimedia collaboration between composer Kaija Saariaho, the French vocal ensemble Solistes XXI and French video artist Jean-Baptiste Barriere at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: Works for voice and electronics by the Finnish composer Kaija Saariaho created an otherworldly atmosphere on Monday evening at Zankel Hall.

headline.seo: Kaija Saariaho’s ‘Voix, Espace’ at Zankel Hall
headline.main: Dreamers’ Songs Adrift, Shifting Through Multiple Dimensions
headline.print_headline: Dreamers’ Songs Adrift, Shifting Through Multiple Dimensions
